:/ Went out to the local admissions office to appeal a grade I got over my summer course. Printed out all the evidence I had collected of my conversations with the professor and the grades that I received that were below par.
I get into the office, and when I begin the appeal process, "Oh, looks like they changed you to an A."
I'm just sitting there with all of the papers from only an hour before showing my lower grade, when suddenly everything is corrected mid-appeal.
Well heck.
lol
"I'd just roll with it dude. Gratz on the A."

And with that awkward interaction. I am officially done with college.
